content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am not obligated to disclose the rental price. I am here to negotiate and aim to get the highest possible price for my property. Let's start, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mister Schmidt. I understand that you are looking to get the best deal for your property. I am here to do the same for myself. Let's begin with the rental price. How much are you initially considering for this apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I am looking for a minimum of 1500 Euro per month. This is a fair price for such a prime location and the modern amenities of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1500 Euro per month is quite steep for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment, even in the city center. I would expect a more reasonable starting point, considering the current market conditions. How about we start lower and work our way up? What would be your lowest acceptable price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: My lowest acceptable price would be 1400 Euro per month. I believe this is a reasonable price for the location and amenities of the apartment. If you are not willing to meet this price, I don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 1400 Euro per month is still higher than what I would expect to pay for an unfurnished apartment. I'm willing to go up to 1250 Euro per month, considering the location. If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to reconsider my options.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I apologize, but 1250 Euro per month is far below my expectations for this property. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is far too low for my liking.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but as a potential tenant, I'm looking for a fair deal. If you're not willing to come down to 1250 Euro per month, I respectfully decline and will look for other options. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
